name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan
name_original: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan
description: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan is a platform video game, the third installment in the Ty the Tasmanian Tiger series. It is published by Activision, instead of Electronic Arts which published the game's two predecessors. It was developed by Krome Studios and was released for PlayStation 2, GameCube, Xbox and Game Boy Advance. It was released in North America on October 11, 2005 for Xbox, October 12, 2005 for PlayStation 2 and GameCube and November 1, 2005 for Game Boy Advance. On February 3, 2006, the game was released in limited quantities in PAL regions only for PlayStation 2 and Xbox. A PC version released via Steam entered its Early Access program on March 19, 2018.
